author: Special Correspondent
text:
Flying squad officials seized Rs. 96,000 from three persons during a vehicle check at Vasudevanallur in the district on Sunday.

When the flying squad members, led by Tahsildar Suthanthiraraj, was conducting vehicle check near a private seed farm on Vasudevanallur main road, they intercepted a car proceeding from Madurai to Tenkasi.

The flying squad officials recovered “unaccounted money” to the tune of Rs. 96,000 from Senthilraj (30), Babu (30) and Saravanakumar (29), all from Chinthamani in Madurai.

As they reportedly could not account for the cash they were carrying, the money was seized and handed over to the officials at Sivagiri taluk office. The rightful owners could get the money back if they submitted relevant documents, the officials said.
title: Flying squad seizes Rs. 96,000
